amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in H. Rept. 105-762 to prohibit title X funding to a family planning provider that knowingly provides contraceptives to a minor without the consent of a parent or legal guardian.

action.text: Substitute (A002) offered by Mr. Istook to the Greenwood amendment (A001).
On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 200 (Roll No. 504).
